specifications: Camera Sensor Type 4/3" MOS Sensor Size Valid image range: approx. 17.8 x 10 mm Color Filter Primary color filter Effective Pixels Approx. 12,400,000 pixels (single panel, 16:9) Gain Video Cam mode: -6dB ~ 18dB (in 3dB steps) Film Cam mode: ISO 200 ~ 3200 Normal Sensitivity f/8.0 normal (2000lx, 3200K, 89.9% reflex, 1080 59.94i) Horizontal Resolution 800 TV lines (at center standard) Color Temperature ATW, ATW LOCK, preset 3200K, preset 5600K, preset VAR, Ach, Bch Shutter Speed Preset (59.94 Hz) 60i/p mode: 1/60, 1/100, 1/120, 1/500, 1/1000, 1/2000 30p mode: 1/30, 1/50, 1/60, 1/120, 1/250, 1/500, 1/1000, 1/2000 24p mode: 1/24, 1/50, 1/60, 1/120, 1/250, 1/500, 1/1000, 1/2000 Preset (50 Hz) 50i/p mode: 1/50, 1/60, 1/120, 1/250, 1/500, 1/1000, 1/2000 25p mode: 1/25, 1/50, 1/60, 1/120, 1/250, 1/500, 1/1000, 1/2000 Syncro Scan in Video Cam mode (59.94 Hz) 60i/p mode: 1/60 ~ 1/250.6 30p mode: 1/30 ~ 1/250.6 24p mode: 1/24 ~ 1/250.6 Syncro Scan in Video Cam mode (50 Hz) 50i/p mode: 1/50 ~ 1/250 25p mode: 1/25 ~ 1/250 Syncro Scan in Film Cam mode 10 to 180 to 360 d (in 0.5 d steps) Slow Shutter (59.94 Hz) 60i/p mode: 1/2, 1/4, 1/8, 1/15, 1/30 30p mode: 1/2, 1/4, 1/8, 1/15 24p mode: 1/2, 1/3, 1/6, 1/12 Slow Shutter (50 Hz) 50i/p mode: 1/2, 1/3, 1/6, 1/12, 1/25 25p mode: 1/2, 1/3, 1/6, 1/12 Recording Recording Media SD memory cards: up to 512MB, 1 GB, 2 GB (FAT12, FAT16) SDHC memory cards: 4 GB, 6 GB, 8 GB, 12GB, 16 GB and 32 GB (FAT32) SDXC memory cards: 48 GB, 64 GB (exFAT) Note: Class 4 is supported in PH and HA modes, and Class 6 is supported at VFR recording and in PS mode. Recording Format AVCHD ver.2.0 (MPEG-4 AVC/H.264/AVCHD Progressive) Recording Modes PS mode (59.94 Hz): 1080/59.94p, PH mode (59.94 Hz): 1080/59.94i, 1080/29.97p, 1080/23.98p, 720/59.94p, 720/29.97p, 720/23.98p HA/HE mode (59.94 Hz): 1080/59.94i PS mode (50 Hz): 1080/50p, PH mode (50 Hz): 1080/50i, 1080/25p, 720/50p, 720/25p, HA/HE mode (50 Hz): 1080/50i Transmission Rate PS mode: approx. 25 Mbps (VBR) PH mode: approx. 21 Mbps (VBR) HA mode: approx. 17 Mbps (VBR) HE mode: approx. 6 Mbps (VBR) Recording Time Approx. 12 hours (PH mode 1920x1080 or 1280x720 with two 64GB SDXC memory cards) Interval Recording Off/1 sec. /10 sec. /30 sec. /1 min. /2 min. Note: recording mode is fixed to PH 1080/24p (59.94 Hz) and PH 1080/25p (50 Hz) and the maximum shooting time is 24 hours.
